name: Freaked Fleapit
storyline:
One day, you wake up - only to find yourself in a run-down, dilapidated cinema.
A Fleapit, if you will.

Bad news? You're dead, and your soul is trapped in Purgatory - which just so happens to look like an old movie theater.
Good news? The Reaper herself offers you a way to get out, not without the help of enchanting inhabitants of the Freaked Fleapit.
All you have to do is go through each of the 9 circles of Hell, beat any demons along the way - and you're free! Sounds easy enough...
summary: Hell never looked this good! Save your soul in a wild cocktail of rhythm-based dungeon crawling and date sims, and dance your way through 9 circles of Hell to heart-pumping music. Which devilishly delicious lady of the Fleapit will be the one to join you on your trip out of Purgatory?
